overview: Spectrum is a silent love story between a young man and a young lady, using colors to express feelings and thoughts. A young man, who is very sad and lonely, falls in love with a dancer, but is sidetracked by a mysterious shadowy figure. The figure tempts the boy, threatening his relationship.
tagline: A man's compassion and dedication in a relationship is challenged by dark, mysterious forces at work in his mind.
title: SPECTRUM
